titles.title: My God, my Portion, and my Love

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: My God, my Portion, and my Love, My everlasting All, I’ve none but Thee in heav’n above, Or on this earthly ball, Or on this earthly ball.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: What empty things are all the skies, And this inferior clod! There’s nothing here deserves my joys, There’s nothing like my God, There’s nothing like my God.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: To Thee I owe my wealth, and friends, And health, and safe abode; Thanks to Thy name for meaner things, But they are not my God, But they are not my God.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: How vain a toy is glittering wealth, If once compared to Thee! Or what’s my safety, or my health, Or all my friends to me, Or all my friends to me.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Were I possessor of the earth, And called the stars my own, Without Thy graces and Thyself, I were a wretch undone, I were a wretch undone.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: Let others stretch their arms like seas, And grasp in all the shore; Grant me the visits of Thy grace, And I desire no more, And I desire no more.
